Description_lang: $?s109964[Spirit Shell's duration is increased by ${$s2/1000}.1 sec, and its absorption is increased by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1%|r.][Rapture's duration is increased by ${$s2/1000}.1 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1*$s3/100}.1%|r.]

description_blz.en_US: Rapture's duration is increased by 1.0 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by 7.5%.
description_blz.es_MX: La duración de Rapto aumenta 1.0 s y su mejora de Palabra de poder: escudo aumenta un 7.5%.
description_blz.pt_BR: A duração de Enlevo aumenta em 1,0 s, e o aperfeiçoamento da Palavra de Poder: Escudo aumenta em 7,5%.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht die Dauer von 'Euphorie' um 1,0 Sek. und die Verstärkung von 'Machtwort: Schild' um 7,5%.
description_blz.en_GB: Rapture's duration is increased by 1.0 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by 7.5%.
description_blz.es_ES: La duración de Éxtasis aumenta 1,0 s, y la mejora de Palabra de poder: escudo aumenta un 7,5%.
description_blz.fr_FR: La durée d’Extase est augmentée de 1,0 s et son amélioration Mot de pouvoir : Bouclier est augmentée de 7,5%.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Estasi di 1,0 s e il suo potenziamento di Parola del Potere: Scudo del 7,5%.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Вознесение" действует на 1,0 сек. дольше и усиливает "Слово силы: Щит" на 7,5% эффективнее.
description_blz.ko_KR: 환희의 지속 시간이 1.0초만큼 증가하고 신의 권능: 보호막 강화 효과가 7.5%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 狂喜的持續時間延長1.0秒，且強化真言術：盾的效果提高7.5%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 全神贯注的持续时间延长1.0秒，它提供的真言术：盾强化效果提高7.5%。
